<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cynical](/Feats.aspx?ID=2672) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 394, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 4</row>

</column>

---

You've been approached with suspicion and distrust throughout your life and return these sentiments back to the strangers you encounter. As a result, you are difficult to deceive. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Perception DC against [Lies](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) and [Impersonations](/Actions.aspx?ID=46).
name: Cynical
